name: dcmunpack
description: Sorts and converts a directory of DICOM files (Siemens, GE, Philips) into an output hierarchy with nifti (nii), mgh, mgz, or analyze output formats.

inputs.description: Dicom source directory. You can specify more than one.
inputs.name: Source Directory

inputs.description: Output directory. Do not need to include when just getting information about what is in the directory.
inputs.name: Target Directory

inputs.description: Specify unpacking rules for a given run (series). Eg, "-run 3 bold nii f.nii".
inputs.name: Run Specification

inputs.description: Save all scans in the targetdir as runo.seqname.format.
inputs.name: Auto Run Sequence

inputs.description: Unpack series with 'scout' or 'setter' in the name.
inputs.name: Keep Scouts Flag

inputs.description: Only scan the directory and put result in file.
inputs.name: Scan Only

inputs.description: Assume that there is only one dicom series in each subdir.
inputs.name: One Per Directory Flag

inputs.description: Input extension (eg, dcm).
inputs.name: File Extension

inputs.description: Input prefix (i.e., input file name init string).
inputs.name: File Prefix

inputs.description: Input pattern (i.e., string that occurs in the middle of file name).
inputs.name: File Pattern

inputs.description: Do not create the fname-infodump.dat file.
inputs.name: No Infodump Flag

inputs.description: Do not use FSFAST hierarchy.
inputs.name: Generic Flag

inputs.description: Only copy dicom files to output directory (implies -no-convert).
inputs.name: Copy Only Flag

inputs.description: Do not convert to output format.
inputs.name: No Convert Flag

inputs.description: Convert even if output is newer than the input dicom.
inputs.name: Force Update Flag

inputs.description: Print out max in given dicom file.
inputs.name: Max Flag

inputs.description: Report filename without path.
inputs.name: Base Flag

inputs.description: Put keystring before each run line (good for searching).
inputs.name: Key String

inputs.description: Save index of files to index.out.dat (for re-use).
inputs.name: Index Out

inputs.description: Read index of files (can make things much faster on 2nd run).
inputs.name: Index In

inputs.description: Add -it dicom to mri_convert cmd line.
inputs.name: IT DICOM Flag

inputs.description: Continue to unpack data even if there is an error in conversion.
inputs.name: No Exit on Error Flag

inputs.description: Skip a given run (good when using -auto-runseq).
inputs.name: Run Skip

inputs.description: Turn off DICOM rescaling based on tags (0028,1052) (0028,1053).
inputs.name: No Rescale DICOM Flag

inputs.description: Turn DICOM rescaling on.
inputs.name: Rescale DICOM Flag

inputs.description: Turn off trying to read DWI parameters.
inputs.name: No DWI Flag

inputs.description: Set -iid to mri_convert.
inputs.name: IID

inputs.description: Set -ijd to mri_convert.
inputs.name: IJD

inputs.description: Set -ikd to mri_convert.
inputs.name: IKD

inputs.description: Add session info to each line of the info file (pat, date, man, scan, field, serno).
inputs.name: Extra Info Flag

inputs.description: Copy first dicom file into output folder.
inputs.name: First DICOM Flag

inputs.description: Turn off dcm2niix conversion.
inputs.name: No DCM2NIIX Flag

inputs.description: Add the string _phase to volumes that are phase images based on ImageType.
inputs.name: Phase Flag

inputs.description: Fips parameters: project, site, birnid, visit.
inputs.name: Fips Fields

inputs.description: Fips-run parameters: run paradigm.
inputs.name: Fips Run

inputs.description: For fips, only create xml file, do not convert to output.
inputs.name: XML Only Flag

inputs.description: Log output to a file.
inputs.name: Log File

inputs.description: Enable debug mode.
inputs.name: Debug Flag

author: FreeSurfer Developers
